resources.string: Error with adding source. Please try again.
The post you tried to open is invalid and not working with this app. Open it in your browser.
This image is not valid, or does not exist anymore.
The RSS feed URL is invalid.
The publisher\'s RSS feed may be out of date, or the url may have changed. The feed could not be opened.
No internet connection available.
Feed can\'t be loaded. Connect to internet and try again.
No sources added.
You have not added any sources to your feed yet. Go to the content- or discover-tab to add some.
Too many requests.
You have sent too many requests. Wait for a while and try again.
Error reading from url.
Nothing found from the given URL.
No internet connection or bad host url.
You have not granted write permissions to the app.
No email app was found. Send feedback to niilo.poutanen@gmail.com
Unable to open article. This post has no URL attached to it.
No valid RSS format detected.
Error exporting sources.
No sources were found in the file. Please try another one.
